XData.name: Cube
XData.Data: <cube xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee" name="HoleFoodsTransactionCube" displayName="HoleFoods Transaction Cube" disabled="false" abstract="false" sourceClass="HoleFoods.Transaction" countMeasureName="%COUNT" countMeasureCaption="# Transactions" bucketSize="8" bitmapChunkInMemory="false" defaultListing="Listing" precompute="0" disableListingGroups="false"> <dimension name="Product" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="All Product" allDisplayName="Product" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Product Category" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Product.Category" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Product Name" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Product" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> <property name="Name" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Product.Name" hidden="false" isName="true" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"></property> <property name="SKU" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Product.SKU" hidden="false" isName="false" isDescription="false" isReference="false" useDisplayValue="false"></property> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Channel" disabled="false" hasAll="true" allCaption="All Channel" allDisplayName="Channel" type="data" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Channel Name" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Channel" list="false" nullReplacement="No Channel" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Outlet" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All Outlet" allDisplayName="Outlet" type="data" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Region" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Outlet.Country.Region.Name" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Country" disabled="false" sourceProperty="Outlet.Country.Name" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="City" disabled="false" sourceExpression="%source.Outlet.Country.Name_" "_%source.Outlet.City" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <dimension name="Sale Date" disabled="false" hasAll="false" allCaption="All DateOfSale" allDisplayName="DateOfSale" sourceProperty="DateOfSale" type="time" calendar="gregorian" iKnowType="entity" hidden="false" showHierarchies="default"> <hierarchy name="H1" disabled="false"> <level name="Year Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="Year" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Quarter Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="QuarterYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Month Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Day Sold" disabled="false" timeFunction="DayMonthYear" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> <hierarchy name="H2" disabled="false"> <level name="Quarter" disabled="false" timeFunction="QuarterNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> <level name="Month" disabled="false" timeFunction="MonthNumber" list="false" useDisplayValue="true" useAsFilter="true"> </level> </hierarchy> </dimension> <measure name="Amount Sold" disabled="false" sourceProperty="AmountOfSale" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false" formatString="$#.##.##"></measure> <measure name="Units Sold" disabled="false" sourceProperty="UnitsSold" aggregate="SUM" type="number" hidden="false" searchable="false"></measure> <calculatedMember name="Last 30 Days" disabled="false" dimension="Transaction Age" valueExpression="%OR([Sale Date].[Day Sold].[NOW-30]:[NOW])" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="Last 90 Days" disabled="false" dimension="Transaction Age" valueExpression="%OR([Sale Date].[Day Sold].[NOW-90]:[NOW])" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <calculatedMember name="Last 60 Days" disabled="false" dimension="Transaction Age" valueExpression="%OR([Sale Date].[Day Sold].[NOW-60]:[NOW])" hidden="false"></calculatedMember> <listing name="Listing" disabled="false" listingType="table" fieldList="%ID,Product->SKU,DateOfSale,Outlet->City As "Outlet City",Product->Name As "Product Name",UnitsSold,AmountOfSale" orderBy="%ID,DateOfSale"></listing> <listing name="Geo Listing" disabled="false" listingType="map" fieldList="DateOfSale,%ID,Product->Name As "Product",AmountOfSale,Latitude,Longitude" orderBy="DateOfSale,%ID"></listing> </cube>
